name: Black Myth: Wukong
about_game: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. The story is based on Journey to the West, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

requirements.minimum: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) | CPU: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1600 | RAM: 16 GB | GPU: GTX 1060 / RX 580
requirements.recommended: OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit) | CPU: Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 5 3600 | RAM: 32 GB | GPU: RTX 2060 / RX 5700 XT
